name: WeatherScore
0:
”Alexa ask weather score the weather in Seattle last week”
”Alexa ask weather score the score of New York yesterday”
”Alexa ask weather score for a detailed summary of Honolulu for last month”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weather score
des:
- This skill can give you a bird's-eye view of past weather information for a list of cities. If you are planning a potential move, or buying real estate in a new city, or you simply want to learn some facts, this skill will help you get familiar with the climate of that city. 
- The weather summary/briefing gives you the high, low, and average temperature during a time period. It also tells you how much it rained at the daily granularity.
- Get an outdoor score to understand how comfortable it usually is in your city of interest.
- Get an even more detailed summary of the percentage of the time for hot/cold, humid/dry, cloudiness and precipitation over a time period, by asking for a detailed summary.
- Supported cities: Los Angeles, New York, Chicago, Dallas, San Jose, Denver, Honolulu, San Francisco, Seattle, San Diego, Beijing, Hong Kong, Tokyo, Singapore, Shanghai
- Supported time periods: yesterday, last week, last month.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
